column1: Little Goat Diner////Three words. Fat Elvis Waffle. The peanut butter butter is exactly what it sounds like and it is pretty amazing. The waffle is hearty
column2: but not overbearing or doughy. It's got a good fluff to it which I appreciate. Bulls Eye French Toast is not bad either
column4: the french toast itself is just a bit much for me personally. I would really recommend the parathas burrito most of all though. It's a great meal with rich flavors and a nice chili pepper sauce
column5: simple but really really well done. Good stuff here.
